dek: What jobs are you physically willing to do?

first_question.text: Select the physical tasks your job requires you to do.

story.text:
This job is most like your job. 


Each dot represents about 50,000 people.
These are also similar jobs. The higher up it is, the more the average pay is for the job.
These jobs have very different physical demands from yours.
As you can see, there is often a huge salary gap between people who do physically demanding jobs—and people who don't.
But there are many other types of jobs in between.

story.hl: Percent of day where standing is required, mean
story.text: Let’s color in the jobs based on what percentage of the day workers are required to stand.
